dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 4926 IH: Highway Funding Transferability Improvement Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Hageman (for herself and Ms. Titus) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To amend title 23, United States Code, to provide for increased transferability of Federal-aid highway funds.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Highway Funding Transferability Improvement Act.
Section 126(a) of title 23, United States Code, is amended by striking 50 percent and inserting 75 percent.
